DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis of this study is that Lipiodol uterine bathing improves the success rate of in vitro fertilization (IVF) for women with endometriosis or recurrent IVF implantation failure.
DOC.brief_title: The In Vitro Fertilization - Lipiodol Uterine Bathing Effect Study
DOC.criteria: 12 or more months infertility Age 18 to 39 Endometriosis or recurrent IVF implantation failure Patent fallopian tubes Iodine allergy Blocked fallopian tube or tubes
